label: Travel Agencies
persona: End-to-end travel booking and package management
summary: A comprehensive platform for travel agencies to create, manage, and sell travel packages. Features include itinerary building, supplier management, booking automation, and customer relationship tools. Built specifically for tour operators and travel agencies who need to streamline their operations from inquiry to post-trip follow-up.
bullet_1: Dynamic package builder with real-time pricing and availability
bullet_2: Automated booking confirmations and itinerary generation
bullet_3: AI travel assistant for personalized trip recommendations
